name: Dulce - Demo
description:
Dulce is a short role-playing demo I created in four evenings, the result of a quest design test I completed. This scenario follows social scientist William Sharp as he infiltrates a secret underground New Mexico facility where humans and other creatures conduct physical research in preparation of a coming galactic war. William's primary interest is to protect the Native American town of Dulce, which rests above the base, and whose residents suffer from persistent, mysterious illness.

The Dulce Base conspiracy captured the imaginations of UFO researchers in the 1980s and '90s, but the stories of the subterranean research carried out at the lab soon faded from the collective consciousness.

Until now.
